citeinfo.origin: Alaska Coastal Zone Management Program, Division of Governmental Coordination, State of Alaska contract to Environment and Natural Resources Institute, University of Alaska, Anchorage
citeinfo.title: Alaska Coastal Zone Boundaries

descript.abstract: The database is a statewide depiction of Alaska's Coastal Zone boundaries, and State of Alaska Department of Fish and Game's associated boundary narratives, updated in 1994. An ARC/INFO AML has been developed that extracts single 1:250,000 USGS quadrangles subsets of data and reprojects it to UTM, allowing use of the data at this scale. Associated ASCII files linked to the INFO attribute file contains legal boundary descriptions for each quadrangle. Data is limited to use at a 1:250,000 scale or smaller and is intended for use at a regional or statewide scale for general planning purposes. Site specific evaluation of CZM boundaries should consult more detailed CZM District data sets existing in manual and some in automated form. The Habitat and Restoration Division of The Alaska Department of Fish and Game has a working copy of this data set that is utilized for the coastal zone permitting process.

idinfo.accconst: Upon completion of the database data will be available as per State of Alaska Chapter 6 of the State of Alaska Administrative Code signed November 1994, Alaska Statutes A.S.09.25.110-09.220.
idinfo.useconst: Boundary accurracy is restricted to 1:250,000 scale and smaller.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metac: Upon completion of the database data will be available as per State of Alaska Chapter 6 of the State of Alaska Administrative Code signed November 1994, Alaska Statutes A.S.09.25.110-09.220.
